org.apache.flink.core.memory

接口 DataOutputView

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.io.DataOutput
    所有已知子接口:
    SeekableDataOutputView
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractPagedOutputView, ChannelWriterOutputView, DataOutputSerializer, DataOutputViewStreamWrapper, FileChannelOutputView, FixedLengthRecordSorter.SingleSegmentOutputView, HashPartition.BuildSideBuffer, InMemoryPartition.WriteView, InPlaceMutableHashTable.RecordArea.RecordAreaOutputView, InPlaceMutableHashTable.StagingOutputView, RandomAccessOutputView, Record.InternalDeSerializer, SerializedUpdateBuffer, SimpleCollectingOutputView, SpillingBuffer

    @Public
public interface DataOutputView
extends java.io.DataOutput
    This interface defines a view over some memory that can be used to sequentially write contents to the memory. The view is typically backed by one or more MemorySegment.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void skipBytesToWrite(int numBytes)
      Skips numBytes bytes memory.
      void write(DataInputView source, int numBytes)
      Copies numBytes bytes from the source to this view.

      • 从接口继承的方法 java.io.DataOutput

        write, write, write, writeBoolean, writeByte, writeBytes, writeChar, writeChars, writeDouble, writeFloat, writeInt, writeLong, writeShort, writeUTF

    • 方法详细资料

      • skipBytesToWrite

        void skipBytesToWrite(int numBytes)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Skips numBytes bytes memory. If some program reads the memory that was skipped over, the results are undefined.
        参数:
        numBytes - The number of bytes to skip.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if any I/O related problem occurred such that the view could not be advanced to the desired position.

      • write

        void write(DataInputView source,
           int numBytes)
    throws java.io.IOException
        Copies numBytes bytes from the source to this view.
        参数:
        source - The source to copy the bytes from.
        numBytes - The number of bytes to copy.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if any I/O related problem occurred, such that either the input view could not be read, or the output could not be written.
